photo.title: 20 SCENERIES OF CLASSIC EARTHEN BUILDINGS IN FUJIAN

photo.description: There's a picture of Mao on the top right-hand door
photo.title: Tulou village building

photo.description: A puppet play was being staged because of the holiday and all the residents of the round house turned up to watch it. The play was accompanied by loud music and gongs.
photo.title: Fujian, China

photo.description: Photos of family members in the tulou's ancestral shrine

photo.description: Tulou, a place of wonder has a bustling life beyond tourism. The people are nice, laid back and enjoy every moment of their simple yet fulfilling lives. The food are great and the living style forced a positive community rather than isolation.
photo.tags: tulou communal community kid duck chicken cow ox fujian xiamen landscape people old men crowd women woman man mountain hills architecture d3s china holiday travel interesting cool 1635mm flickraward

photo.title: Tulou and the life surrounding it
Chickens fighting in a Tiánluókēng tulou

photo.description: This tulou was orginally built in 1550. It was set on fire during the Taiping Rebellion. Rain doused the flames but it was later damaged again in the civil war in 1929, leaving part of the structure missing. Many of the rooms are now empty, with just a few residents (including chickens, ducks and pigs) living on the ground floor, and the central buildings are dilapidated. It was a fantastic place to stay for a night.
photo.title: Huánxìng Lóu

photo.description: The smallest tulou, with just 16 rooms, constructed between 1875 and 1908.
photo.title: Rúshēng Lóu

photo.description: This tulou is largely abandoned because the front wall needs to be supported with scaffolding from the inside. A few people seemed to be living there though.
photo.title: Entrance to Wŭyún Lóu

photo.description: The people from Tulou are Hakka and known to be extremely welcoming towards strangers. This kid is together with our guide who's been following us the entire trip.
photo.tags: tulou temple fujian xiamen landscape people kid girl mountain hills architecture d3s china holiday travel interesting cool 1635mm
photo.title: People of Tulou

photo.description: In my hands is the wicker 'helmet' that would have prevented my brains being dashed out shouId have fallen from the back of the motorbike taxi I took to see the tulous.

Sharon fruit in the entrance to Jiusheng Lóu
